Class GameLevel

data.GameLevel

public final class GameLevel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<GameObject>
Represents a level in Sokoban, implementing

COMP2012, Shuxiang Hu

      Saves a new game record into the record file of current level
      Parameters:
      username - the user name of the player who created the record
      timeInterval - the time for the player to complete this level
